key_work.material_description: new and re-purposed materials, cotton, linen, silk, leather, rubber, metal
key_work.brief_description: Judy’s everyday outfit is a tapestry of petticoat, skirt, apron, blouse and bodice. This layered approach that costume designer Edie Kurzer took allows different parts of the costume to be added or removed to create different looks, while reflecting the character’s downtrodden background.

links.description: Steve McQueen’s critically acclaimed Widows was based on the British TV series of the same name. The premise sees the widows of three criminals take on their final heist. The original was so popular, it was adapted and spun off several times globally.

end.title: She's Out
end.brief_description: Dolly Rawlins is free again. She has served the eight year prison sentence for her husband’s murder and is now set to collect the six million pounds worth of diamonds that she stashed before she was sent down. The money will enable her to follow her dreams and start a new life. But her former cell mates have their own ideas…
